text: Ardico Magnini (; 21 October 1928 – 3 July 2020) was an Italian footballer. He played as a defender. Magnini was born in Pistoia, Italy. From 1953 to 1957, he played for the national team. From 1950 to 1958, Magnini played for Fiorentina. Magnini died on 3 July 2020 at the age of 91.Fiorentina in lutto: è morto Ardico Magnini, eroe del primo scudetto ==References== ==Other websites== * La Gazzetta dello Sport Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Footballers from Tuscany
title: Ardico Magnini
